languages.text: "Нет, я... не сбегу. Обещаю". {n}Кассия больше не дрожит — напротив, прижимается к вашей груди, положив голову вам на плечо. Вы чувствуете биение ее сердца — мерное, сладостное, уже спокойное.{/n} "Ах, {name}..."

traits.locale_text: "Нет, я... не захочу. Обещаю". {n}Кассия больше не дрожит — напротив, прижимается к вашей груди, аккуратно положив голову на плечо. Вы чувствуете биение ее сердца — мерное, сладостное, уже спокойное.{/n} "Ах {name}..."

languages.text: "No, I... I shan't leave. I promise." {n}Cassia is not trembling anymore. Instead, she clings to your chest and rests her head on your shoulder. You can feel her heart pounding in a measured, sweet, and calm rhythm.{/n} "Oh, {name}..."
languages.original_text: "Нет, я... не сбегу. Обещаю". {n}Кассия больше не дрожит — напротив, прижимается к вашей груди, положив голову вам на плечо. Вы чувствуете биение ее сердца — мерное, сладостное, уже спокойное.{/n} "Ах, {name}..."

traits.locale_text: "No, I... I shan't. I promise." {n}Cassia is not trembling anymore. Instead, she clings to your chest, her head resting gently on your shoulder. You can feel her heartbeat — measured, sweet, and calm.{/n} "Oh, {name}..."

"No, I... I shan't. I promise." {n}Cassia is not trembling anymore. Instead, she clings to your chest, her head resting gently on your shoulder. You can feel her heartbeat — measured, sweet, and calm.{/n} "Oh, {name}..."

"No, I, uh, I shan't leave. I promise." {n}Cassia is not trembling anymore. Instead, she clings to your chest and rests her head on your shoulder. You can feel her heart pounding in a measured, sweet, and calm rhythm.{/n} "Oh, {name}..."

"No, I, uh, I shan't leave. I promise." {n}Cassia is not trembling anymore. Instead, she clings to your chest and rests her head on your shoulder. You can feel her heart pounding in a measured, sweet, and calm rhythm.{/n} "Oh, {name}..."

"No, I... I shan't leave. I promise." {n}Cassia is not trembling anymore. Instead, she clings to your chest and rests her head on your shoulder. You can feel her heart pounding in a measured, sweet, and calm rhythm.{/n} "Oh, {name}..."

"No, I... I shan't leave. I promise." {n}Cassia is not trembling anymore. Instead, she clings to your chest and rests her head on your shoulder. You can feel her heart pounding in a measured, sweet, and calm rhythm.{/n} "Oh, {name}..."

languages.text: 「いいえ、私はもう、あなたから離れません。約束です」{n}カシアはもう震えてはいなかった。代わりに、あなたの胸にしがみつき、その肩に頭を預けている。彼女の心臓が、ゆったりとした、甘く穏やかなリズムで鼓動しているのがわかる。{/n}「ああ、{name}…」
languages.original_text: "No, I... I shan't leave. I promise." {n}Cassia is not trembling anymore. Instead, she clings to your chest and rests her head on your shoulder. You can feel her heart pounding in a measured, sweet, and calm rhythm.{/n} "Oh, {name}..."

traits.locale_text: 「いいえ、私はもう、あなたから離れません。約束です」{n}カシアはもう震えてはいなかった。代わりに、あなたの胸にしがみつき、その肩に頭を預けている。彼女の心臓が、ゆったりとした、甘く穏やかなリズムで鼓動しているのがわかる。{/n}「ああ、{name}…」

languages.text: “不会了，我……我不会走了，我答应你。”{n}卡西娅不再颤抖。相反，她依偎在你的胸前，将头靠在你的肩膀上。你感觉她的心脏在有节奏地跳动着，充满了平静与甜蜜。{/n}“噢，{name}……”
languages.original_text: "No, I... I shan't leave. I promise." {n}Cassia is not trembling anymore. Instead, she clings to your chest and rests her head on your shoulder. You can feel her heart pounding in a measured, sweet, and calm rhythm.{/n} "Oh, {name}..."

traits.locale_text: “不会了，我……呃，我不会走了，我答应你。”{n}卡西娅不再颤抖。相反，她依偎在你的胸前，将头靠在你的肩膀上。你感觉她的心脏在有节奏地跳动着，充满了平静与甜蜜。{/n}“噢，{name}……”

languages.text: «No, yo... no me iré. Lo prometo». {n}Cassia ya no tiembla, sino que se aferra a tu pecho y apoya la cabeza sobre tu hombro. Puedes sentir los latidos de su corazón en un ritmo medido, dulce y tranquilo.{/n} «Oh, {name}...».
languages.original_text: "No, I... I shan't leave. I promise." {n}Cassia is not trembling anymore. Instead, she clings to your chest and rests her head on your shoulder. You can feel her heart pounding in a measured, sweet, and calm rhythm.{/n} "Oh, {name}..."

traits.locale_text: «No, yo... no me iré. Lo prometo». {n}Cassia ya no tiembla, sino que se aferra a tu pecho y apoya la cabeza sobre tu hombro. Puedes sentir los latidos de su corazón en un ritmo medido, dulce y tranquilo.{/n} «Oh, {name}...».

languages.text: "Nein, ich ... Ich werde nicht gehen. Das verspreche ich." {n}Cassia zittert nicht mehr. Stattdessen klammert sie sich an deine Brust und legt ihren Kopf auf deine Schulter. Du spürst Ihr Herz in einem gemessenen, süßen und ruhigen Rhythmus schlagen.{/n} "Oh, {name} ..."
languages.original_text: "No, I... I shan't leave. I promise." {n}Cassia is not trembling anymore. Instead, she clings to your chest and rests her head on your shoulder. You can feel her heart pounding in a measured, sweet, and calm rhythm.{/n} "Oh, {name}..."

traits.locale_text: "Nein, ich, äh, werde nicht gehen. Das verspreche ich." {n}Cassia zittert nicht mehr. Stattdessen klammert sie sich an deine Brust und legt ihren Kopf auf deine Schulter. Du spürst Ihr Herz in einem gemessenen, süßen und ruhigen Rhythmus schlagen.{/n} "Ach, {name} ..."

languages.text: « Non, je... je ne partirai pas. Je vous le promets. » {n}Collée à votre poitrine, la tête sur votre épaule, Cassia ne tremble plus. Vous sentez son cœur apaisé battre tout contre vous.{/n} « Oh, {name}... »
languages.original_text: "No, I... I shan't leave. I promise." {n}Cassia is not trembling anymore. Instead, she clings to your chest and rests her head on your shoulder. You can feel her heart pounding in a measured, sweet, and calm rhythm.{/n} "Oh, {name}..."

traits.locale_text: « Non, je... je ne partirai pas. Je vous le promets. » {n}Collée à votre poitrine, la tête sur votre épaule, Cassia ne tremble plus. Vous sentez son cœur apaisé battre tout contre vous.{/n} « Oh, {name}... »

languages.text: "Hayır... Gitmeyeceğim. Söz veriyorum." {n}Cassia artık titremiyor. Aksine, sıkıca göğsüne sarılıp başını omzuna yaslıyor. Cassia'nın kalbinin dengeli, sevimli ve sakin bir ritimle attığını hissedebiliyorsun.{/n} "{name}..."
languages.original_text: "No, I... I shan't leave. I promise." {n}Cassia is not trembling anymore. Instead, she clings to your chest and rests her head on your shoulder. You can feel her heart pounding in a measured, sweet, and calm rhythm.{/n} "Oh, {name}..."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır... Gitmeyeceğim. Söz veriyorum." {n}Cassia artık titremiyor. Aksine, sıkıca göğsüne sarılmış, başını omzuna yaslamış. Cassia'nın kalbinin dengeli, sevimli ve sakin bir ritimle atışını hissedebiliyorsun.{/n} "Ah {name}..."
